name: Escape Room!
description:
Escape Room - Teaser 🔊[ONLY ENGLISH]🔊 ⚠ GAME STILL IN DEVELOPMENT[OPEN BETA] ⚠ ------------------------------------ ‼ NOW EVEN ON MOBILE ‼ 🖱!REQUESTED MOUSE!🖱 ------------------------------------

🎈In this game you are a prisoner and your prupose is to get out.... and only for the most avid... there is a News...!YOU'LL SEE!🎈

------------------------------------

📣  HOW CAN I PLAY:

📣 You have just to collect the missions and escape from the room

📣 Plus Version only for Pros

------------------------------------

📣 CONTROLS:

📣 WASD: Movement 4 Directions

📣 DRAG AND DROP

📣 MobileCONTROLS:

📣 4 Arrows Bottom Left Corner: Movement 4 Directions

📣 DRAG AND DROP
